title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.2, open the ImageAnalyzer example. Note that the scrollbars are currently enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not perform any action.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to avoid confusion and provide a better user experience.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Open a small image, like an icon.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect.
